relation: Move this action item list to the new wiki
Add desired features from MoinMoin to MediaWiki
Create backup policy for the site, and implement it
Move the site to it's public address
Move content from CELF site to wiki
Talk to Tim Riker about use of eLinux domain name
Write first draft of site policy guide
Collect bids for the editor position
Decide which wiki engine to use
Current Movial backup strategy is daily incrementals and weekly full. Still need to obtain access to backups, confirm restore procedure.
Site is currently at it's public location. Movial still wants to do a server migration though. Will work with Lars to iron this out in July.
This is essentially complete. However, Bill will confirm with Lars that the Movial server can handle multiple GB's of attachments. Limit must be identified.
Need to get on top of this, as wmat is already beginning to notice people doing dumb things, like taking down pages to rewrite them instead of editing them in place.
Organization of the top level design is driven from the front page. As the front page morphs, so will the design. This is OK, as the front page is protected for now.
TimRiker is talking to other users of the eLinux wiki, We seem to agree in principle, but there are a few others to contact.
We need to clarify what this means?
